org.springframework.orm.hibernate5

类 SpringFlushSynchronization

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.transaction.support.TransactionSynchronizationAdapter
      • org.springframework.orm.hibernate5.SpringFlushSynchronization
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Flushable, Ordered, TransactionSynchronization

    public class SpringFlushSynchronization
extends TransactionSynchronizationAdapter
    Simple synchronization adapter that propagates a flush() call to the underlying Hibernate Session. Used in combination with JTA.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.2
    作者:
    Juergen Hoeller

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.springframework.transaction.support.TransactionSynchronization

        STATUS_COMMITTED, STATUS_ROLLED_BACK, STATUS_UNKNOWN

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.springframework.core.Ordered

        HIGHEST_PRECEDENCE, LOWEST_PRECEDENCE

        public void flush()
        从接口复制的说明: TransactionSynchronization
